name: The Train to Redamancy
description:
The World of Monsters is where humanity's fears are given life. Cinder, a volcanic sprite, meets an odd group of Halloween monsters who have settled in the human world. Unfulfilled by her everyday existence, she travels with them to the human world where a better life awaits.

A game made for the Spooktober Visual Novel Jam by two people.

Estimated reading time is about 2 hours.

Content warnings: oblique references to the use of guillotines; being orphaned.

Original soundtrack by cross_couloir.

Art by cross_couloir and mint-to-be

Story concept and script by mint-to-be.
